name: The Chocolate Velvet
description: This spin on a traditional Black Velvet brings out the chocolaty side of stout. For a festive touch, add a hint of orange bitters and rub the rim of the glass with orange peel. If you're a fan of those foil-wrapped chocolate oranges, you may have just found your new favorite holiday drink.

recipeInstructions.text: For each drink, put two dashes Regan's Orange Bitters in a champagne flute. Fill flute two-thirds full with Young's Double Chocolate Stout, then top off with dry sparkling wine. Stir gently.
Rub the rim of the glass with orange peel, and squeeze peel over the drink to release oils. Garnish with orange peel and serve immediately.
